full_summary:
# TSPS - Senior Change Management Consultant

## Title

* English: Senior Change Management Consultant
* French: Expert-conseil supérieur Gestion du changement

## Announcement Reference

* Reference Number: cb-5992-64791455
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: 20240250

## Tender Details

* Publication Date: 2023-05-31
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-22T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-06-22
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

## Service Description

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PWGSC) requires the services of one senior change management consultant to develop and implement an Updated Change Management Approach. The approach must assist with managing the change from legacy systems to the Electronic Procurement Solution (EPS), empower PWGSC sectors and regions to adapt their processes to support the adoption of the EPS, and align with the implementation of an updated operating support model and the transition from EPS project to program mode.

## Eligibility Criteria

This requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 (less than $3.75M) and under the stated consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise.

## Procurement Strategy

The procurement strategy is a Competitive - Selective tendering. The selection criteria is the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. The contract will be conditionally set aside under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received by Indigenous businesses who are certified under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) criteria and who may be listed in the Government of Canada’s Indigenous Business Directory.

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Thérèse Richer
* Contact Email: therese.richer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (343) 574-2636
* Contact Address: 11 Laurier, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
